topic.title: as i expected the
topic.body:
sun behind the
clouds the
spoons and knives are
just recognazible as my
everyday life I come 
here your masks droping can
you see my mask falling
too? i breath slowly and
drinks cups of coffee to
be awake someday it'll be
clear does it have to be
clear? i go with the
wind as i always have
done climbing everywhere
on everything that
appears dazy and 
confused but inspired with
new paths                                i see

how can i manage this
awful words black 
hole through hidden
conversations one snake
bitting the other i in the
middle waiting the clock
add one more second then
other until it'll be gone

i know there is no
better place than
here nowhere to go but
now

as the clock
ticks i discover new
layers of space
    people
  plants
     work
       money

oh Boredom!
king of life
who eats all living
flame
you put your hands in my job
and now i've to rediscover
beauty through everyday's ashes.

1553919472_1FAjgFhx96FDLwnL2JCMYDjuT9QcG.body:
> [leftside](#comment_688_16dEowtNbV89NxPcDrAKkmnuXtiJVoVcDm): I like spoons and knives part.

> [styromaniac](#comment_672_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): I ain't reading that. That text is a mess.

youre welcome
